verbs.description: [ARG0: We] [V: hear] [ARG1: it] [ARGM-TMP: every day] [ARGM-ADV: from the left] . Trump is attacking our democracy ! Its like a leaky faucet .
We hear it every day from the left . Trump [V: is] attacking our democracy ! Its like a leaky faucet .
